name: spotlight-draw
description: Chrome extension for annotating web pages during screensharing and recording sessions

scripts.zip: npm run clean && cd extension && zip -r ../spotlight-draw-$(node -p "require('../package.json').version").zip . -x '*.DS_Store' -x '*/README.md' -x '*/convert-icon.html' && cd .. && echo "Created spotlight-draw-$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip"
scripts.zip:latest: npm run clean && cd extension && zip -r ../spotlight-draw-latest.zip . -x '*.DS_Store' -x '*/README.md' -x '*/convert-icon.html' && cd .. && echo 'Created spotlight-draw-latest.zip'
scripts.test:watch: echo 'Open tests/test-runner.html in Chrome and refresh after code changes'
